import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Add.css' const Add = () => { const [image, setImage] = useState(false); const [data, setData] = useState({ name:"", description:"", price:"", category:"Breads", quantity:"" }); const onChangeHandler = (event) => { const name = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; setData(data =>({...data, [name]:value})) } return (
